item.title: 6 Steps to Land a Remote Job & List of Remote-First Companies
item.description: So, you’re on the hunt for a remote job? You should already have an updated resume, professional LinkedIn profile and polished portfolio (should I make a post/video about these 3?

item.title: How To Craft Your Career Change Story
item.description: There’s no sugarcoating the fact that changing careers is challenging. It’s much easier to move from one job to another within the same industry or field than to change careers altogether.
